column4: hello, how the hell i make my desktop like it was in 10.04?? i mean basic gnome?
this is the last time im going to upgrade ubuntu!
GNOME 2 is dead, the GNOME team killed it
There is a fork developed by gnome2 fans called 'mate-desktop-environment'
It's a complete clone of gnome2
But it's not really available for Ubuntu yet
Might consider Xfce, it gives the gnome2 feeling to me
nice. thanks for the info. you meaning theres no .deb yet?
Yeah, the only real package there is is an AUR package
im so hating this. i was so comfortable with my old setup.
It will then change to the new one (actually give a menu selecting which you want)
actually do you remember name of that "menu"
You can switch to lightdm by doing this: sudo dpkg-reconfigure lightdm
